Class CardPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • view.CardPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, SelectionChangeFollower

    public class CardPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements SelectionChangeFollower
    JPanel where card graphics is displayed.
    See Also:

      • drawCardGraphics

        private void drawCardGraphics(java.awt.Graphics2D cardGraphics2D,
                              java.awt.image.BufferedImage suitImage,
                              java.lang.String valueString,
                              java.awt.Color color,
                              int x,
                              int y,
                              int width,
                              int height,
                              boolean busted)
        Utility method to draw a single PLayingCard's graphics.
        Parameters:
        cardGraphics2D - the Graphics2D object that is to be drawn on
        suitImage - the suit BufferedImage
        valueString - the value String that is places at the top-left and bottom-right
        color - the Color value of the card
        x - the x coordinate where drawing begins
        y - the y coordinate
        width - the width of the card being drawn
        height - the height of the card
        busted - true if the card caused a bust, false otherwise

      • readSuitImage

        private java.awt.image.BufferedImage readSuitImage(PlayingCard.Suit suit)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Utility method to read the suit images from the file system.
        Parameters:
        suit - the Suit enum for which the image is read
        Returns:
        a BufferedImage based on the suit
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if reading the suit image fails
